website_summaries.verdict: Expanded size options and accessories for on the job make this set a very attractive option for the working craftsman.
pros: Since this kit includes convenient sizes for plumbing, electrical, and door-lock installation tasks, this kit combines durability with versatility
cons: The paint on the saws themselves tends to come off pretty easily

customer_reviews.title: A complete kit!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hole saw kit for nearly a year. I've used it to drill wood and aluminum with no issues. They seem just as sharp as when I originally purchased them. The key to getting a great cut is matching the drill rpm with the size hole that you are drilling. I've always been a fan of dewalt and these live up to the reputation. When I purchase off amazon, I do a fair amount of research to make sure I'm buying the best product at the best price. This product met those requirements. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: CBen

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I use mine today on several different materials. Wood, plastic boxes, plywood, drop ceiling tiles. And they cut did not cut smooth. Very rough cuts. It was ripping the material not cutting it. And lots of plastic melting not cutting. They are ok for the price. But for professional work. I dont recommend. Do better dewalt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Opossum

customer_reviews.title: Great Hole Saw Kit - Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set/kit for those like me who bore a wide range of holes. Used two of the sizes to bore 4 dozen holes and the hole saws performed well. I generally drill 3/4s of the way through the wood, flip the piece over and finish the hole from the opposite side to prevent tear out and to prevent the loose piece from jamming inside the hole saw. But even when the loose piece jammed, it was easy to remove. Seem sharp, stayed sharp, perfectly happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A. LoganbillTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and I like the case
customer_reviews.text: Good deal and I like the case. I have a collection of individual saws from different companies, but the problem I had was the mixture of arbors I had and always missing something. Got to the point where I just brought new ones, because I got desperate.
customer_reviews.author: simpleperson

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice set with a nice box
customer_reviews.text: I was drilling metal pipe the first time i used and broke 2 teeth in the first 30 seconds. And when i used them to drill wood 2 ×10 it took a long to to cut all the way through for being brand new.. but it is a nice set with a nice box .. but there are no direction with them and i still dont know if i am using the 1 holder right.. wich is Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt's hole saw kit is great for your everyday projects.
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt tends to make high quality tools, durable and strong, and they have done it again with this kit. The hole saw kit makes a great edition to any weekend tinkers / do-it-yourselfer's home tool collection. With the bit size selection, one would be almost certain to have what they need and with the value, there is no reason not to add this to one's workbench. Lastly, the no-tool bit removal tool makes changing bits fast and easy, adding connivence to the projects on your to-do list. Overall, I am extremely happy with this purchase and would recommend this to any friend with around the house projects.
customer_reviews.author: Wags

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Except
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit mainly for holes in wood. It works very well, the reason for only a 3 star rating is my 1 3/8" saw was not threaded. It is useless. This is not Amazon's fault so I wrote DeWalt and told them. As I expected NO response! I expected, at least, a response of "return it to Amazon and have them replace it" which would cost me more in shipping then to just buy a saw blade that size. I mainly resent not getting even a response from DeWalt. That is not customer service and with no customer service, I won't deal with their products anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Used the 1.5” saw to cut through the back of a wall unit to create a cable access. More than a few of the teeth came off and the rest are mere nubs. SUPER low quality. I’m buying Milwaukee next time. I love my Dewalt tools, I’ve got more than a few but these home saws are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Why do they paint these if the color comes right off???
customer_reviews.text: Saws tested on 1mm thick aluminium, cut through with just a little wobble. Coloring did not survive. Abd the extra pilot bits are a nice touch, they don't even mention you get some! Triangular shank, screwed into the adapter with a large allen, the offset from afapter center barely noticeable. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceless Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Had to use the 18V for the larger ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to use the 18V for the larger mandrel. Did not fit into the 12V. But the hole saws cut right through the jeep hood sheet metal. Update. Drill bit section of mandrel snapped right off while drilling. Contacted Dewalt for warranty replacement. Will update on their response. Update. Dewalt responded quickly and is shipping out a replacement mandrel. Great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: OCD_OBD

customer_reviews.title: No good, pretty much single use.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 holes all teeth got ripped off. Somewhere there is terrible quality control when the teeth are tempered, if they are tempered at all. The teeth are definitely hardened, a file test shows that. They just seem to be brittle as hell and prone to break off.
customer_reviews.author: Till Uro

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best or the worst I have had... Would guess made in ??? Quality not quite up to what I expect from Dewalt. Cut 4 holes in some 12ga CR metal and the teeth on the saw looked, ...well I'm glad all I needed was 4 holes... Lenox set I've had for many years, this set won't last that long...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a wood worker and I needed to cut some large diameter holes so I bought this DeWalt Hole Saw Kit. It turns out that the kit is a high quality product and works very nice. I have struggled with some cheaper products in the past to do the same thing and this time I bit the bullet and bought something I know I will be happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gillis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a steal!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a complet kit, all in one place, not trying to keep track of two pieces in an old package....now can’t find the bit...not anymore. This thing is so handy, and the hard case is seriously sturdy, so no worries of it banging about in your work box.
customer_reviews.author: 013CMB!

customer_reviews.title: This is a great portable set of hole saws
customer_reviews.text: Works well, only problem is that my holder that is spring loaded for the hole saws broke. It is still usable you just have to make sure you don't loose parts for it. I think it is time to order another one. This is a great portable set of hole saws. Must have for anyone who needs tools. I will be buying another one so it does work well.
customer_reviews.author: James Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful !
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many of the so called universal, cheap, economy, bargain hole saws over the years only to have wasted money. This was a no brainer way to go. Not only do they cut through wood, thick wood, and plastic but work great for cutting holes in metal with precision. There is NOTHING like having the right tool for the job. I've been purchasing a couple saws a month and will do so until the collection is complete. I do a lot of woodworking and craft building and these are great for everything.
customer_reviews.author: joeaverageuser

customer_reviews.title: best hole saw set
customer_reviews.text: I did some research within and outside of Amazon before purchasing this set. Other websites reviewed various hole saw kits, and gave Dewalt top honors. The other main contender was Bosch. All of my cordless power tools are Bosch, and I love them. But I chose Dewalt for this because of this particular product's consistently high ratings and top recommendations. You can't go wrong with this set.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not match what's in the image, sloppy packaging, will return
customer_reviews.text: Hole saws are not labeled, my pack does not have the sizing chart on the inside, labels sloppily placed, product does not match what's in the image
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Best quality I have tried yet
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional, love the quick coupler to, well built and have no reason to believe otherwise that these will last a very long time. Only lost one star because it does not have the 1-1/4" bit. I would buy again, anytime.
customer_reviews.author: AK Wireless

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Best hole saw I have owned. These are deep and very solid. I am a loyal customer to DeWALT and their hole saws will not disappoint. I added the 3" and 4" to my order and have already used them both. NOTE: They do run a battery down on a cordless drill super fast so I use my corded drill for these.
customer_reviews.author: OkieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through 1/16" steel well!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the 1" saw to cut holes in my front and rear bumpers for proximity sensors, and it did a great job cutting through the 1/16" steel! It wasn't quite like a hot knife through butter, but all I had to do was apply a little pressure and it cut right-on through. Be sure to tighten the pilot, drill bits as mine was a little loose from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Dylon

customer_reviews.title: A good set
customer_reviews.text: I used them to drill some holes in birch ply. Found them very adequate, easy to get the waste out, well machined parts. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Assaf

customer_reviews.title: As described and good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband. He picked it out and likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Quality but, parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Saws seem sturdy and of good quality. Unfortunately, neither the small quick-change mandrel nor the large quick-change mandrel are in the case. Without the mandrels, the saws are useless. Be sure to inventory the parts when you take delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt holesaw kit
customer_reviews.text: Great set. All the common sizes in one case. The only drawback is that when you use the larger sizes, you will need a 1/2" drill. Luckily, I have a half inch cordless drill. The first time that I used the set, I needed the larger drill chuck. Other than that, it's made by Dewalt...so the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Delligatti

customer_reviews.title: but design is very good quality. Blades lock in place on spindle very ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak about durability yet, but design is very good quality. Blades lock in place on spindle very solid. Cuts faster than any others I've had including Morse. Two spindles for the different sizes. Nice solid carrying case with metal clasps to boot.
customer_reviews.author: WIdadof3

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, no non-sense tool!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty! Don't buy the cheap stuff from other manufacturers if you plan on using these more than once.. I made that mistake! You'll literally have this set forever.
customer_reviews.author: family man

customer_reviews.title: High quality !
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, very compact hole saw set. I am very happy with the case also. It even comes with extra pilot bits, collar screws and a allan wrench. That is very handy on the job, that you don't have to runand get a new bit if you break one. I think it showes once again, the thought and quality that goes into Dewalt tools
customer_reviews.author: Erik W.

customer_reviews.title: Chews through metal doors like soft butter!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This made short work of my steel door! I had to enlarge a hole for a new deadbolt. The hole saw I had just smoked (literally)! No amount of pressure or cutting oil helped. Within 30 seconds with the Dewalt my hole was resized and I was installing my new deadbolt!
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Hell yeeaaaahhhhh!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great. Have cut about 25 door handles and 10 countertop sink holes and the blades are still sharp. Actually only used 4 bits but the quick chuck is awesome. Two chucks and three additional pilots were worth over half the price alone
customer_reviews.author: joshb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to extract cut stub
customer_reviews.text: Solid; Easy to extract cut stub. Cuts metal (which makes it irreplaceable by Fostner bits). Very happy with the set and use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: THG

customer_reviews.title: It works excellent. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was going to need this eventually but I needed it sooner than anticipated. It works excellent. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vegas

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: used it a couple of times, has all the sizes you need, comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Da P.A

customer_reviews.title: but other than that very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The hole saws work well. I mostly cut sheet metal and dry wall and the do fast work of both. My kit came with a slightly different small arbor but it works none the less. I unfortunately didn’t receive a 1 3/8 hole saw, but other than that very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Drew O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Good tools do good work.
customer_reviews.text: Those items that I have used do the job. I have not yet figured out how to use the second quick connect and disconnect yet. But working on it. Dewalt puts out a good product. I have always found them to stand behind what they sale.
customer_reviews.author: Tagwatts1

customer_reviews.title: Nice product in heavy duty case
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Alot of different sizes to choose from
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN

customer_reviews.title: An Amateurs Professional Tool
customer_reviews.text: A great kit for a home user. Not sure how it's stand up to professional use. Very well built, complete assortment, American built. I'd recommend it to a pro, but the question is, would a pro recommend it to me? I like to think they would.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Walker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised, I like that all the hole saw are in a case so you don’t lose them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Standard Assortment
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful addition to the Dewalt drill. Makes for very clean cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Thus far I have used them to install camera systems. They work for cutting through metal, board, ceiling tiles. Very sturdy product and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Corner

customer_reviews.title: works great but on 1 or two of the screw on ...
customer_reviews.text: used this a few times, works great but on 1 or two of the screw on saws the pilot bit does not extend past the saw. i have to use a different pilot bit from a drill bit set.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Hole in one
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit and has all the sizes and very handy. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as advertised. I've owned a few of these hole saw kits and this one is the by far the sharpest and easiest to use.
customer_reviews.author: OZ4

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of this saws painting was damaged. Other i will see how it will work
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Hole Saw kit
customer_reviews.text: Works good for periodic use, not for professional use. The bits don't last as long as some of the competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: no paint issues!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a kit! I am very impressed with this kit. Dewalt must have fixed the issue with the paint in the threads. My threads are clean and the saws twist on like butter. I can see I will get plenty of use out of it. I would recommend this kit to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron & Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Used these a few times at work and knew there were the ones for my garage. Probably more tgan what i need, but i never had a problem with DeWalt products and these have proven the same. Used a few times in metal and wood and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect when you need install sick cabinets. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: leodstarellas

customer_reviews.title: great product and love the case
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for both wood and plastic. I did however find the large arbor to be too small for my cordless drill
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The quality of the tool is quite high and its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Podman

customer_reviews.title: Good price, and glad to have a set again
customer_reviews.text: Lost my last set in a move, and when the need came up to use one I went into DT's. Good price, and glad to have a set again. Now in an easy carrying case as well!
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM D.

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely with my cordless Dewalt drill
customer_reviews.text: Need to drill holes of varying sizes? This kit will do the trick. Works nicely with my cordless Dewalt drill, but obviously will work with other drills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these. They work great. I use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: John M  Tanner

customer_reviews.title: ... as well as two (2) doors and it functions great. Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hole saw kit to install new plumbing as well as two (2) doors and it functions great. Easy to use and works well. The Dewalt name still means something.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this for a long time and finally got it. Dewalt has some nice stuff you know.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Zinke

customer_reviews.title: Really like the case this array of hole saws are stored ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the case this array of hole saws are stored in! Only used one bit thus far, to drill a few 1 1/8" holes in 3/4 " plywood. Worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Good set, but....
customer_reviews.text: There is no 2 3/8 in the set. Had to buy it separate and no place to put it in the case. Will chew thru floors and studs (avoid nails if possible) really well. Hard case is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: framer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Like all dealt products great quality for a great price. Good assortment of sizes with sturdy case. Saves a ton compared to buying them separately.
customer_reviews.author: stinkbug

customer_reviews.title: This is the best price on the web for this set
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price on the web for this set. AND they have a deeper hole cut than most other hole saw sets.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Therrien

customer_reviews.title: ... a durable plastic case that keeps everything organized and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a durable plastic case that keeps everything organized and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Markley

customer_reviews.title: Great Hole Saw Kit at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: What a great hole saw kit. Mostly used with a drill press and it always comes through.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you have drill with 1/2” shank -
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this product because in order to use the larger hole saws you need to have a drill that has a larger shank than the standard drill size. Don’t buy this kit expecting all of the saws to work on your standard drill. For a standard drill the largest holesaw you can use is the 1 3/8”. For the larger hole saws you will need a drill with a 1/2” shank. I got this kit primarily to use the larger hole saws but in order to do that I’m going to have to buy another drill.
customer_reviews.author: Eika373

customer_reviews.title: Cut them holes
customer_reviews.text: This is what it is. Enough said. What else would you expect from dewalt
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt continues to deliver quality at a good price. Just as good as our Lenox ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt continues to deliver quality at a good price. Just as good as our Lenox ones we are replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this DeWalt product. It's compact size makes for easy storage. My like of this product shouldn't be surprising as the only tools I own are made by DeWalt. I think if pays off in the long run to buy the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift - he will love it. The case is very sturdy and nothing jiggles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As with most things dealt, this is a quality kit with everything i'll ever need in it and more.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product the only reason I did not give it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product the only reason I did not give it 5 stars was the wood is difficult to get out of the hole saws sometimes. Could use a better design
customer_reviews.author: Jared A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT D180005 14 Piece Master Hole Saw Kit
customer_reviews.text: Had a few jobs lined up for this one. Got it and really like it. Thanks again Dewalt!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Worked as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Utilized this product to cut a hole in drywall for a new light fixture. Worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J Beifuss

customer_reviews.title: Tactical Keychains Approves!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my butt a few times, I have a Greenlee kit (lasted 11 years) but the Greenlee doesn't have this many sizes. this is perfect for a DIY guy.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Hole Saw Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase..Good value and very good quality. Would definitely recommend this item to anyone needing to purchase something similar
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bates

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: expensive but love having this set. Now if I only had a drill. LOL
customer_reviews.author: darby griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, but one of the saw blades ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, but one of the saw blades would not fit on the mandrel without removing the paint from the threads.
customer_reviews.author: hillcountry

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit and great packaging. Have used several of them so far on metals and they are working well.
customer_reviews.author: Dak Prod

customer_reviews.title: Best hole kit I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy metal, sturdy teeth, strong shank. Glad I purchased this kit.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDball-dot-com

customer_reviews.title: Best hole saw kit on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Best hole saw kit made. Nothing else needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: CRI

customer_reviews.title: Best Hole Saw Kit
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale and find it to be the most compact kit that I have and wind up using it the most...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Millman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great hole saw kit for a good price! You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Life

customer_reviews.title: very good & complete set
customer_reviews.text: very good size selection and all with deep 'pockets' to contain the drilled wood. This is a great plus when trying to remove the drilled wood.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: They Work As They Should
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, these are very well made by a major player in the tool business. They get the job done as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit. I have wanted a full set of these for years and this set has not disappointed me. Glad to stop using those rinky dink hole saws.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived yesterday as expected. Just what I expected out of Dewalt tools.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Junk Yard Dog

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this hole saw kit is much better than i expected. the kit has more sizes than i thought and they are made of a heavy duty metal.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK LEVERINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Complete kit w/good parts, and the carry case is a nice bonus as well. Good buy in the Dewalt accessory sale.
customer_reviews.author: David Boevers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality kit with an equally great case!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has just about every smaller hole saw you could use in an organized case. This is a higher quality kit not associated with the super cheap import kits. I would have liked to have had a 3.5 and 4" saw with this kit, but I did buy those separately.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Hansson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for drilling a hole all in one kit.
customer_reviews.author: Easy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the 3/4" saw is too long for the arbor and the drill bit isn't past the saw
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: appears to be a nice kit, nice to have the assortment on hand.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: hole saws
customer_reviews.text: typical dewalt tool works just as described, only wish the case had room for more bits. ex.3',35',4',4.5' etc...
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Forget cheap sets
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed with this kit. I've been using cheap kits all my life and though I'd treat myself and get this... what a difference this is. I wish I'd been using quality earlier. Other than the great cutting, I love the mechanism that locks the saw into the bit - it eliminates any chance of it slipping and coming undone. This is what has annoyed me the most about the cheap kits. It's not exactly cheap, but you get what you pay for in tools. If you want something that will last, won't be frustrated with and likely save you time, pay the extra and get this.
customer_reviews.author: T. James

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: DEWALT brand never failed me and this tool works great, Needed the tool to cut through Aluminum and the tool works like a Charm
customer_reviews.author: Goldmouse

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hole saws excellent quality well fitted into a convenient case.
customer_reviews.author: J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: super product and great price. good people to deal with and fast service. it is a good way to keep all the hole saws in one place and to find them.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Rothney

customer_reviews.title: will be useful someday
customer_reviews.text: recipient hasn't used it yet, but he was happy when he received it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: There is no comparison to this hole saw set to any of the other I have owned and used. Case design and ease of use of attachments is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Danny H

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best hole saw kit I have ever used and a very complete set for almost any job size... Price for the the set was way worth it because how many blades you get in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The hole saw kit provides any size hole at that time you need it. Very easy to change the from saw to saw. Not quite sure how the other driver works with out the pins. In a hard case so very protected and everything is always there.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt hole saws
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. I've used other hole saws, but this one beats them all. I will buy DEVALT HOLE SAWS AGAIN IF I EVER NEED THEM.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK

customer_reviews.title: Is what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set to have on hand and will last a very long time for me. Im not a contractor, we live remote so I just wanted to have these around for when I need them. This is the way to buy them, much cheaper than one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

product_meta.title: DEWALT Hole Saw Kit, 14-Piece (D180005)
product_meta.description:
Designed for the versatile, demanding craftsman, the DEWALT D180005 14 Piece Hole Saw Kit combines all the trade specific tools from DEWALT Plumbers Hole Saw Kit, Electrician's Hole Saw Kit, and Door Lock Installation Kit in one convenient, compact injection molded kit box. At the heart of this kit are hole saws in 3/4-, 7/8-, 1-, 1-1/8-, 1-3/8-, 1-1/2-, 1-3/4-, 2-, 2-1/8-, 2-1/4-, and 2-1/2-inch sizes. Each of these tools features a double tooth design for strength and durability, a special deep-cut geometry for fast, effective cutting, and thick, hardened backing plates to prevent thread stripping and ensure a long life. The small and large quick-change mandrels in this kit help ensure easy set-up and improved productivity. And, like all DEWALT hole saw kits, the Master Kit comes with replacement parts, including two valuable Pilot Point centering bits, so that you can perform maintenance quickly and get back to work.

AMAZON.COM
Designed for the versatile, demanding craftsman, DeWalt's convenient Master Hole Saw Kit combines all the trade specific tools from DeWalt's Plumber's Hole Saw Kit, Electrician's Hole Saw Kit, and Door Lock Installation Kit in one convenient, compact injection molded kit box. At the heart of this kit are hole saws in 3/4-, 7/8-, 1-, 1-1/8-, 1-3/8-, 1-1/2-, 1-3/4-, 2-, 2-1/8-, 2-1/4-, and 2-1/2-inch sizes. Each of these tools features a double tooth design for strength and durability, a special deep-cut geometry for fast, effective cutting, and thick, hardened backing plates to prevent thread stripping and ensure a long life. The small and large quick-change mandrels in this kit help ensure easy set-up and improved productivity. And, like all DeWalt hole saw kits, the Master Kit comes with replacement parts, including two valuable Pilot Point centering bits, so that you can perform maintenance quickly and get back to work.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
DEWALT D180005 14 Piece Master Hole Saw Kit, US & Canada

See more
feature_bullets: TOOL USES: Convenient sizes for plumbing, electrical, and door-lock installation tasks
DEEP CUT STYLE HOLE SAWS: Deep-cut style hole saws for improved efficiency and versatility
DURABLE: High-speed steel height and double-tooth design for increased durability
HARDENED BACKING PLATES: Hardened backing plates to prevent warping and thread stripping
INCLUDES: 11 hole saws, a small quick-change mandrel, a large quick-change mandrel, replacement parts, and case
